ordf.handler = ordf.handler:Handler # ordf.readers = rdflib, sesame2, .... ordf.readers = sesame2 # ordf.writers = ausncrabbit,rabbit, rdflib, sesam2 ordf.writers = ausncrabbit

rdflib.store = Sesame2Store rdflib.url = http://localhost:8982/openrdf-sesame/ rdflib.repository = ausncdev
rabbit.hostname = localhost rabbit.userid = guest rabbit.password = guest rabbit.connect.exchange = rdfupdates #rabbit.connect.exchange_type = ???
ausncrabbit.hostname = localhost ausncrabbit.userid = guest ausncrabbit.password = guest ausncrabbit.connect.exchange = rdfupdates #rabbit.connect.exchange_type = ???
